body_html:
Sure, but other __repr__ has such space :

  • https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/modules/pooling.py#L68
  • https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/modules/normalization.py#L18
  • https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/modules/activation.py#L47

This fix is minimal to be conform with other. But, I agree, that without space is more natural

Edit:
No space here neither :

  • https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/modules/batchnorm.py#L40

body:
Sure, but other `__repr__` has such space : 
- https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/modules/pooling.py#L68
- https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/modules/normalization.py#L18
- https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/modules/activation.py#L47

This fix is minimal to be conform with other. But, I agree, that without space is more natural

Edit: 
No space here neither : 
- https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/modules/batchnorm.py#L40
